website_summaries.verdict: Simply load the soft puzzle and toss it to your dog for hours of playtime as they try their hardest to pull the fuzzy hedgehog toys from their “den.”
pros: Puzzle set includes 3 squeaky plush hedgehogs and a fleece den
Best for small and medium sized dogs
cons: Not for large dogs or hardcore chewers

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ. Intent COMPLETELY DIFFERENT than anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: One of my male dogs has made claim to this toy. He is hilarious guarding this toy when the original intent was for the dogs to share & play together. Every time I turn around he's got this log & protects the chipmunks as if they were his puppies. 💕 Still a wonderful toy & a winner among numerous other choices. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: ZZZ Accounting Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my puppy Gandalfs FAVORITE toy!!!! He loves to put his whole face into the log and sometimes he just sucks on the outside .. it's hilarious!! The little chipmunks are also a lot of fun to throw around. We will be getting more of these as his wears out for sure!! I wish they had a big dog version though, because once he's 100 pounds I might be afraid of him swallowing those little chipmunks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No my dog might just be dumb. She does't get that she's suppose to pull ...
customer_reviews.text: No my dog might just be dumb. She does't get that she's suppose to pull the squirrels. She give me this "how dare you" look when I take the squirrels and put them back in the hole and give the log to her, she doesn't understand it. So i just let her have the squirrels outside of the log. She loves the squeaker in the squirrels. The toy is very well made! Very sturdy log, squirrels fit in the log nicely. If my dog was smarter, it would not be hard for her to get the squirrels out, but I guess she's kinda dumb...
customer_reviews.author: Yesssss

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, didn't last a day and Seller not responding
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Had it not even 24 hours and my puppy bit through it and stuffing came apart and the unravelled the stitching. So I paid $18 for 3 little squirrels. I wrote them and they didn't respond. I want to send it back but not sure I can in this condition. Not happy with product or seller but the concept it a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: leslie ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great for big and small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this toy. We have an 85 pound boxer/mastiff mix and a 17 pound jack Russell mix and they can both play with it easily. It's so cute and very durable - Our big guy is pretty rough with toys and this one is still alive after months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Small chihuahua/terrier mix won't put her new toys down. My little dog has a small snout and these little hedgehogs were perfect for her. The holes on the "house" are pretty big so it's not too hard to take them out but it's enough to keep her occupied and loves when I put them back in. She tore 1 on the 2nd day but I think with any toys and a hyper dog it will happen. I just sowed it back in and it hasn't happened again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gone in 2 minutes :-/
customer_reviews.text: The zippy paws woodland friends burrow (large with squirrels) was great for two minutes. My golden went to town and had the squeaker out and was about to swollow it in less than two minutes- no kidding. I can’t let him have the other two because I had to pry the last squeaker out of his mouth so he wouldn’t swallow it- next time I might not get so lucky. I guess he can play with the stump? Waste of $$.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old, 30 lb. Boykin Spaniel. I gave it to him to play with for the first time while I started dinner. After chopping onions and garlic and seasoning some meat, I turned around to see how he liked it and 2 of the chipmunks were ripped apart and he was going after the 3rd one. Literally, 15 minutes and it was gone. It's already in the trash. Very disappointed. Full disclosure - my pup is a pretty aggressive chewer but this was a record. Very lightweight fabric used and cheaply made. Should have known by the price but the reviews were good...oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Techhaven

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great toy for the first 10 minutes. My 6 pound miniature micro dachshund puppy chewed through the log opening chewed off ears and is just destroying the rest. He is having a great time but I'm afraid this is a toy that's going to last 24 hours at most. the squirrels are very thin and it's just a matter of time before he gets into where the squeaker is. Definitely can't leave your dog with this toy unsupervised.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Dixit

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but wish it were made sturdier
customer_reviews.text: The toy was great at first. My 6 month old puppy really liked it. He was easily able to take out the chipmunks, but that didn't keep him from having fun, and I was able to stuff larger more challenging toys inside so he had to work harder. He still chews on the squeaky chipmunks, though they are a little small and make me a little nervous as a result. He also really liked chewing on the log, however it started to tear after two weeks, and foam started coming out. If this were made better, I would rate it with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! But quality control isn’t evident.
customer_reviews.text: This toy was an instant hit! Both of my German Shepherds love it! But... within seconds, stuffing was coming out it. There were no holes or tear marks that my dogs had made. After examining it, it’s apparent that every other “log ridge” is not sewn shut and the stuffing just falls out. Looks to me that the fabric didn’t reach the stitching. It’s not torn, but the fabric appears not to have been pulled high enough for the stitching to sew it shut. Hoping I can exchange it as my dogs really love it.
customer_reviews.author: ABC911

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind this product is perfect and my dogs loved taking the squirrels out of the log. Sadly, the squirrels are very poor quality. One was ripped before it was even out of the box and the other two were destroyed by my 3 pound dogs within a day of play. My little dogs are not hard on toys and have had many similar stuffed toys for years with no damage other than showing general age. Too bad. Had they been better quality my dogs would have loved this. As is we are putting other little toys in the log with is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: jojojuje

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 pound Maltese who is pretty tough on toys he choose the eyeballs out of everything he rips and choose the ears off of everything he’s pretty feisty with his toys. He absolutely went bonkers over this toy to the point where he got so excited over and played with it so much he was panting and didn’t wanna share. He hasn’t ripped up any of the squirrels thankfully and it is by far his favorite toy. We also just got a rescue puppy last week Who just is learning how to play with toys and he shakes it violently everywhere and it has still survived intact so this is A+ in my book!
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.  The chipmunks aren't bad but the log is poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 1 year old mixed breed puppy. She's a chewer but not overly aggressive so based on the other reviews, it seemed like a good item. WRONG. There are The product ripped within two weeks of receipt; I contacted the seller who in turn bounced me back to Amazon. I returned and ordered a replacement and that one ripped the FIRST day she had it. Don't waste your time or money with this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fun, Long-lasting Dog Toys
customer_reviews.text: originally bought the log w/3 chipmunks for our elderly jack russell terrier - she loved playing with the little chipmunks up till she passed. the log was a bit big for her. it got passed onto her cousins for their enjoyment. we got a french bulldog puppy and came across the burrow w/3 hedgehogs. she has loved it so far - from tackling the burrow, to pulling out the hedgehogs to squeaking each hedgehog. great fund to see her enjoying it. squeakers seem to hold up. cute stitching & fabric details throughout. buy it - you & your dog will love this 4 toys in 1!
customer_reviews.author: Russell R. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Cute, engaging but easily destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Puppy enjoyed the toy while it lasted. The squirrels are pretty fragile but then my 50lb boy is a pretty aggressive chewer. The squirrels were the first to go and then the log was slowly chewed away. Probably lasted about a week but he loved it to death while it lasted. He did love trying to pull out the squirrels when I hid them in the holes so it was definitely nice and interactive for him.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this toy but could be more challenging...
customer_reviews.text: My Aussiedoodle/Old English Sheepdog mix 7-month-old puppy loves this toy but she's smart and can get the little critters out fast so we have to keep putting them back in over and over yet it keeps her attention for a long time as long as we're there to play, too. She loves to put the little animals in her mouth and carry them around making them squeak. We've had to replace them because she chews pretty hard on everything but the log is still in good shape. I'd give it 5 if it was more challenging for intelligent breeds and the little critters were more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie from Salt Lake City

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Within 20 minutes of play there were holes in the seams and stuffing from the log. I was bummed...I did give it 3 stars because I was able to sew the holes and my dogs do love digging out their toys. I put all different toys and treats inside and they go crazy trying to get them out. I keep this toy out of regular play and bring it out maybe once a week to extend the life. I don't know how they could make a plushie type toy more durable for my needle teeth pups, but I still enjoy seeing them go after what's inside.
customer_reviews.author: G-Family

customer_reviews.title: WAS Favorite new toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was the best- for the first 5 days, until it began to rip. The cotton was coming out which was a safety risk, so we had to throw out the log. For now, the squirrels are still intact. This was very disappointing because our puppy loved it. Our mini bernedoodle puppy doesn't usually dive into a new toy- rather she spends some time jumping all around it and isn't sure of her approach, but with this one- she went straight it and played for a good 20 minutes without interruption. It seemed very gratifying for her to get the squirrels out of the log! Too bad it wasn't better made
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bonnie Zucker

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous for puppies and dogs that are aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: This toy is not for puppies that aggressively chew. Received it yesterday and within a matter of minutes my 4 month old pup tore apart one of the chipmunks got the squeaky toy out chewed and swallowed it. Had to take her to the emergency vet to induce vomiting. My pup is ok, but I’m out 350 dollars for the vet and 14 for the toy. But most of all thankful my pup is alright. So pup owners beware very dangerous for aggressive chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up to a 3 pound Chihuahua!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the toy today. My 3 pound Chihuahua was playing with it for about 5 minutes and I noticed he was pulling stuffing out of the log. I looked and saw that the back of one of the squirrels was ripped open right at the stitching on the back. I'm not sure if I got a defective one, but it's sad because he seems to enjoy the toy, and I was hoping that it would last him awhile since he is so small. I saw on the reviews that bigger dogs were playing with it, and it seemed to be holding up. If this held up I would given it a 5 star since he likes it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Motherlyunicorn

customer_reviews.title: cutest toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: the hedgehogs are so cute that i didn't let my dog play with it a few days so that i could play with it. Eventually, I gave in ahd it is her favorite toy. She loves digging them out of their 'tree trunk", ,she loves biting them and running around the house, she loves just chewing on them. So far, they've all survived and that's with her playing with them multiple times a day. I even washed them in the washing machine and they're back to fluffy cuteness. I will purchase another one when this one dies a happy death.
customer_reviews.author: Chiro

customer_reviews.title: My Rottweiler loves the toy and it has become her favorite. She was somewhat disinterested at first
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to add to the squirrels that came with the toy. I find that the number that comes with these types of hiding toys are limited, so we always buy additional. My Rottweiler loves the toy and it has become her favorite. She was somewhat disinterested at first, so be patient and show your dog how it works. I will insert a video at my first convenience. Hardy, well made replacements (or supplements).
customer_reviews.author: SueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Scooter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell terrier loves it. He started in on it straight out of the package and after I showed him the animals inside it took him 30 minutes or so to get the 1st one out. Now, he's really, really stuffed toy aggressive and here's the problem with this toy, stuffing from the log started flying about an hour after he got it. It's just not tough enough. He's had it for roughly 24 hours and I have stuffing scattered everywhere. I'm extremely happy with how much he loves it and enjoys trying to get the little animals out, but for the price I can't see buying this or similar again unless they are made more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Boyer

customer_reviews.title: This is entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun buy. I bought this because my dog, like most, is obsessed with squirrels. We have the same squirrel that comes by in the same manner every day in our yard and my dog goes crazy. I thought it'd be funny to get her her own squirrels! The log itself is very durable. It is fun and gives her something to do and focus on. The squirrels... She's torn one up already and she hasn't had it a full month. She's a 10lb pomeranian mix haha. I'll be looking for more squirrels to put in the log in a month or so. I don't regret this purchase one bit. She LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great dog squeeky toys!
customer_reviews.text: Our medium sized lab collie mix, the runt of her litter, absolutely loves ZippyPaws Skinny Peltz No Stuffing Squeaky Plush Dog Toys. They're definitely a favorite of hers. She's been chasing chipmunks in our yard for years, so I had to get the ZippyPaws chipmunks and log. She went crazy with the log carrying it around the house for a couple of weeks , but has settled down, but plays with the chipmunks constantly. Well made, just the right size, and still squeaking. She likes to tease my son by bringing a chipmunk, but then it becomes a game of squeaky keep away. I highly recommend ZippyPaws toys.
customer_reviews.author: John Maryan

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT ALL PITBULL PUPPY APPROVED.
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this toy would last longer than it did for a large dog but this is information for my fellow 6 month PITBULL puppy. I have had pit bulls for over 13 years and I have yet to find a toy that would be any kind of a match for pittys except Wilson (only) tennis ball's but after 3 months or so they are a goner. Other then that this toy would be great for probably any other pup.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 year old, 70 lb lab that tore through every component of this toy in 2 weeks flat. The squirrels were first to go then he shredded the log. It’s durable and good for non aggressive chewers and has fared better than other plush/fabric toys. He would probably tear everything apart in under a week a second time around since initially he would only try to pull the squirrels out. It may last longer if you monitor and keep replacing the toys in the log before your doggo can gnaw on the squirrel for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly fun toy for my mixed toy terrior
customer_reviews.text: My toy terrier mix dog is keenly aware of real chipmonks on our property, so he really enjoys this toy. He carries the log around like a serious prize and enjoys pulling the stuffed squeak toys out of it and playing with them separately. He never tires of this! Having three holes in it takes the wear and tear off of only one hole. He pulled off a couple of the animals' felt ears early on but has since not gotten rough with the others. Overall, this has been a sturdy and fun toy for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T.

customer_reviews.title: No Checks before shipping out items, received a damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I received my little burrow log with the three chipmunks today and was really disappointed with the quality of it. There were little threads poking out of the chipmunks and one had a broken squeaker. The log also had a hole with the stuffing already coming out of it, and this was before my dog had even played with this toy. I was hoping for a great product as all the reviews were great. Buyers, take caution.
customer_reviews.author: rina park

customer_reviews.title: Dog obsessed with this toy; Not for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog for Christmas and she is totally obsessed with it! She quickly figured out how to get the chipmunks out and happily chews on them while they squeak until I put them back in the log and she starts all over again. She did make a small tear in the log but I was able to sew it up and she seems to generally understand that the log is not a toy to be chewed on. The durability of this toy will definitely depend on your dog. I know mine is pretty gentle with her toys so it works for us! She prefers this toy over all the other toys she got for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toy, but arrived with a few rips, and holes
customer_reviews.text: This dog toy I bought for my puppy arrived with several tears or unfinished seams. But it is a reasonable price which is why I’m giving it 4 stars overall. The log had a hole in it and 2 of the squirrels had holes in them. I was going to return it, but decided to sew up the holes myself. So if you are handy with a needle and thread, this should be no problem. It seems ok now, but the threaded facial features of the squirrels are coming loose, and this is also happening on the log. That’s why I don’t think it will be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: 🐕 Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I hide treats in this I hide his dry dog food in it.. I think he thinks the dog food is a treat since its in this and somehow different than what's in food bowl. It's funny watching him stick his face inside or actually roll it over to make food fall out. He will not play with the chipmunk unless it's a game of fetch, he won't pull them out of log just to pull them out,but it's definitely a lot of fun watching him play with the log and I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo W.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea...dangerous toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to engage the mind of my cavalier King Charles spaniel. The concept is stellar but the toy is so cheaply sewn it is a menace. The first day the stitching came loose on one of the critters and the stuffing found its way down my pup's throat. I could easily return it, but I dont know another one of better quality so will sew it, probably repeatedly.. If a squeaker finds its way down a pup's throat this seller will have more problems than a bad review IMO.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small fur baby. Not sure how it would hold up with a large fur baby.
customer_reviews.text: My lab/shepherd mix showed no interest in the Zippy Friends Woodland Burrow. Then again, she’s 14-years-old and doesn’t have much interest in any toy that doesn’t contain an edible treat inside. However, my chihuahua immediately began to toss it around and pull out the squirrels, and run around with the squirrel she “captured,” squeaking it with pure joy! She loves it! It was just delivered today, so I really can’t speak to the longevity of this toy, but it seems to be well constructed, at least for a small fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kat V

customer_reviews.title: Great chewing toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my miniature dachshund puppy and she loves it. The chipmunks can be removed and used a a retrieving toy, or you can put your hand in the end hole and manipulate the chipmunks for interactive play. Just one caution, small dogs should be supervised until they reach a certain size. My puppy got her head stuck in the end hole the very first day. She couldn't get out alone, but I was able to stretch the fabric without a problem. Great but for the price, well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lville1

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this toy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave one star for being able to write a review, but it even doesn’t deserved it. My dog is a little Havanese, 8 years old, but very playful. Some of her toys are over 5 years old and still in good shape. Well, she totally destroyed these three in less than 2 hours. It is a dangerous toy! She removed the squaker very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: My dog is mothering them. These are adorable.
customer_reviews.text: If your dog destroys all its toys and you continue to buy it stuffed ones, don't blame the manufacturer when it's YOU that are the obvious problem. Just like kids all dogs are different and the majority of customers including myself LOVE this toy. I ordered the hedge hogs and the chipmonks. My little girl LOVES THEM. They are great quality and so cute. However I think my dog is mothering them. She's carrying them around really gently and wants them around her belly. So adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Karianne Newton

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this toy! He loves pulling out the squirrels from the trunk and loves to squeak them. Unfortunately he decapitated one within 48 hours. He has since been more delicate with his other two squirrels but they no longer squeak one week later. He pulled at a thread on the “tree trunk” and managed to pull out the stuffing there too. Overall not durable for a very playful (and destructive) dog, BUT this was a lot of fun for him. I think I’d buy again in the future since he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Entertained Puppy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, 15 pound puppy loves the hedge hogs hair textures and the ball like shape, each came with a large squeaker inside, very easy for puppy to find and make nose with, the hide holes are large enough for puppy to stick his nose inside...he was so busy keeping track of the three hedgehogs and pulling them out... this is instantly his favorite toy, stopping puppy from chewing up my house, clothes, stopped biting me, and just keep entertained and stop barking and be contently quiet...it's a bless!
customer_reviews.author: T&J O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: The dog loved it.
customer_reviews.text: So how can I give it low stars on thing but still git it 5 stars. It’s because they asked the wrong questions. Longevity? Heck, all the toys my dogs love most need to be replaced monthly if not weekly. Sometimes with big dog you could do it hourly. It’s really not how long something last that is most important to me, it’s how much joy did your dog get from it.....then tell me how long it lasted. After all a dog toy will last forever if a dog doesn’t like it and never chews or plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Tree Villa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Durability, Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent quality product at a reasonable price!! My dog loves the mini-hedgehogs and the whole “get them out of the hedgehog home” process! Very well made, so much so it has held up to hours of “extreme play” by my active puppy who is a biter and chewer and who also loves to take his toys into the backyard. So far, all hedgehogs still squeak and look like they did on the day we received them. We haven’t lost any either, but replacements are even available should that misfortune occur! I’m buying the mini squirrel set next. For $7.99 per set, this toy/game in the smallest size is perfect for my rambunctious 10 lb Maltipoo pup!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Texas

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your dog
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great idea and can be a great toy but if your dog likes to pull stuffing out of things then it might not last long. My dog tore up the log on the first day. However, I got one (stuffed bird house with birds inside) for my daughter’s Labradoodle and it’s her favorite thing. She absolutely gets so excited every time the stuffed friends are put back inside the toy, and she pulls them out after a couple minutes time. She plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MIP

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Puppy approved.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely my puppy's favorite toy right now. None of the plastic enrichment puzzles worked for him. They were too easy to solve and also easy to destroy. But this entertains him. Doesn't take him a ton of time to get them out, and we end up playing fetch with them lol. But it's cute and fun and it makes him happy. I don't recommend tug-a-war with them unless you like to sew. But it's been a few weeks and I think it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute, inexpensive, but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: It took about 10 minutes for our 35 lbs dog to remove the squirrels and eviscerate them. After we cleaned up the mess, she was left with the log which doesn't seem to interest her all that much. Fortunately, the toy was relatively inexpensive. We have tried about every type of toy under the sun, and nothing is safe with her. One toy which was supposed to be indestructible and was made of rope, was ignored, and remained in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Oh

customer_reviews.title: buy this toy for your dog now!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best toy I ever bought for my Chihuahua! He's scared of everything. I pulled all the squirrels out and squeaked the squeaker on one. Then stuffed them all in the log. About an hour later my pup was pulling the squirrels out one at a time and running all over the house with them!!! It was awesome! I ordered the raccoons in a trash can set for when the squirrels are torn up. But we've had the squirrels for well over a month and their still holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: MeganW0227

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes to chase chipmunks in the yard - hasn't caught one, although she has caught squirrels. She knows the term "chippy" so decided to get this for Christmas. At first I don't think she figured out the whole get the chippy from the log thing, but today after about a week she finally did and was running around the living room with her prize. hasn't shredded the guts out of it yet, so hoping it lasts for awhile. It is quality construction and pretty good value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Your dogs new favorite toys!
customer_reviews.text: Our Pomeranian goes NUTS when we buy her a new batch of these......toss them all on the floor at once & she looks like a pinball bouncing around trying to decide which to bite first! Normally "squeaky" toys last 1-2 hours before her teeth puncture them.....these things last for weeks or MONTHS! I normally swap out gross ones after a month or two with a new batch.....but functionally they still squeak after extended daily use. We have had problems with maybe 1 out of 10 either ripping open or the squeaker getting punctured. 100% absolutely the BEST squeaky toy for a small dog on the market (close 2nd would be the small squirrels).
customer_reviews.author: RascalVA

customer_reviews.title: I asked my dog and he said.............
customer_reviews.text: I asked my dog since I think he is a bit more qualified to answer this than I am. He said "he liked it very much and have a lot of fun tossing the pieces around and hiding them all over the house. The squirrels are small enough so I can tote them all over altho I need a little help getting them back in their little house, but my Mom helps me. Great toy." So there you have it..straight from the horses...err, dogs mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels are like puppies
customer_reviews.text: My 50lb lab/shepard mix loves his squirrels. He never figured out how to play with the log, however he regularly carries the squirrels around and treats them very gently, and licks them as if they were puppies. We ask him to "get the baby" and he knows just what to do! It's adorable! As a result, these have stayed in pristine condition, unlike some other toys. If your dog is a chewer, this toy will not last 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: kmt22

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Toy Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We buy Angus, an agressive chewer, toys that he can destroy because these are the only things he destroys. I bought this for his birthday over a month ago and he is still having fun with it. He’s only partially destroyed one chipmunk, and the rest we always put back in the log when he’s finished playing. When he’s bored, I tell him to go get the chipmunk and he’s at it again, pulling them out and playing again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A. Shivers

customer_reviews.title: Quality is CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: The squirrel was apart 15 minutes after opening package. Just looked down and noticed my chihuahua had stuffing from the log. This item was not played much we just opened it a few hours ago as it was just delivered today. Don't bother with this it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this "puzzle"
customer_reviews.text: Our little 12lb Dachshund has a digging and hunting instinct, and the dogs were bred to get badgers out of small holes. This toy fed her instinct, where she'd stick her head in the multiple holes in the "log" and pull out the little critters. The little critters are a perfect size for her mouth, and so far, after over an hour of constant play, she's not killed any of the critters squeakers. So much fun for our little pup.
customer_reviews.author: VN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. I bought it for my puppy and I wasn’t impressed with it. I bought the XL log and it was an okay size, but I found it kind of hard to get the toys from the inside out. It didn’t really stand up well, kept falling over. Don’t recommend spending the money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Bk

customer_reviews.title: An absolute delight for hours and hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Left this out as a surprise to discover and it was like Christmas morning. This squirrel adventure soft tree truck is an absolute delight. It’s his new favorite toy and though it’s almost as big as him, he carries it with him joyfully wagging from room to room. He loves to dig so rooting around in there is so fun. It’s so cute, it’s so, it’s well constructed. Looked at a couple versions and thought this one might be too big but it’s just perfect for my 14 pound pup. Love that he can play for a long time independently.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Doggo Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars each for durability, longevity, and sturdieness, but that is only because my pup has not been super destructo with this one yet. Mostly because he is IN LOVE with this toy. Usually he destroys anything stuffed within a few days, but not this one. He loves digging his little chipmunks out of their log (and is slightly annoyed when I stuff them right back in), and then digs them out again and again. I'm happy to report that this one has lasted so far!
customer_reviews.author: JENNA F

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty tough little toys and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund is literally obsessed with these. I buy this three pack and she has to make sure all three are within 2 feet of her at all times. They are pretty tough little toys and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D.

customer_reviews.title: Will not last a day with a big dog
customer_reviews.text: This item was identified as a big dog toy on Amazon. Well, my German Shepherd ripped it apart on day one...filing all over the floor, chipmunk tails torn off, and even the main portion...or log...was shredded. Interesting because I had bought another dog toy made by this company and it lasted for months before it was torn, but this one is a loser, avoid it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, squeaker doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I gave them 2 stars because my 17lb 8yr old shihweenie loves them but the squeakers in the hedgehogs don’t last longer than a day or 3 at most. He’s not rough with them he just loves to pull them out, carry them around in his mouth and squeak them. He doesn’t like them when they stop squeaking. I’ve already ordered one pack of extra hedgehogs & I want to order a new pack, my 3rd including the ones that came with it but I need the squeakers to last longer! He is my everything. I’ll send back the pack if they don’t last like previous ones. Hoping that is acceptable. Will update later
customer_reviews.author: Ashley4mu

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining Toy
customer_reviews.text: With all the reviews and the low price I figured it was worth trying to keep our new puppy (45lb foxhound mix) busy. While she gets all 6 (we bought 3 extra) chipmonks out of the log in minutes, I was amazed at how she understood what she needed to do and continues to play with it as long as I keep stuffing the chipmonks back in it. While she's already torn one part of the log and unstuffed it and the chipmonks are starting to come apart too, this is pretty normal for her toys and we're satisfied with the price for the amount of entertainment she's gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: I only took off one star because one of the chipmunks eyes came undone within the first few minutes of her playing with them. And she's not super rough her her toys. Other than that, she's been playing with this since Christmas and everything is still intact. She loves it. She can't stand for them to be inside the trunk, as soon as I put them in she HAS to get them out and the. Run around squeakimg them in victory. Lol. Very pleased overall and I think this toy is totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My two little dogs chew everything apart until all the stuffing is gone. I decided to try one of these toy within a toy to see if that would be different. It was! The squirrels are very tiny ( smaller than a fist) but the ears, nose and legs are all stitched in a way that they can be chewed without losing the shape of the animal. The dogs don't touch the log once they've pulled something out. We stick all sorts of toys in there to make it not difficult and it keeps the dogs entertained for large amounts of time. I highly recommend for smaller doggos.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even small dogs will love this large toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 lb chihuahua, even though it is practically bigger than him. He carries it around and it's so funny. I put a small handfull of treats inside and stuff up the 3 openings with larger plush toys and it keeps him occupied for 10-20 minutes. He puts his whole head inside! I have this larger LOG, plus the smaller LOG and the BEEHIVE, and this is the best one, he doesn't play with the two smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: MTMBERR

customer_reviews.title: Engaging Your Smart Dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a 7 month old boxer puppy that is incredibly smart. Finding a toy that engages her brain and her hunter instincts is great. With in minutes of having the toy, she had the first squirrel removed and she was working out different techniques to get at the others. And, it is made so well that she can plan rough when she likes. I honestly wasn't expecting this toy to be high quality given the price...but we are incredibly happy. We will be looking for more toys by this company.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: The squirrels are A+
customer_reviews.text: I have a goldendoodle that is a menace to all dog toys that are not rubber. Which he does not like. I wake up every morning to an explosion a fluff. This toy has lasted 6 months. The log part was destroyed within a half an hour of me turning around. But the squirrels are wonderful. He has one in his mouth every day for the last 6 months. They have lasted. He loves them. And by some miracle they still look good. The squirrels are the real gem in this dog toy
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: My 40lb red heeler mix loves this toy so much ...
customer_reviews.text: My 40lb red heeler mix loves this toy so much she alternates between running around with it in her mouth and humping it. However, it is not durable at all. She's already wrecked two of the chipmunks and ripped the log open (we just received it today). Don't buy this toy for aggressive chewers or medium/large dogs. They'll wreck it within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: I have  an unusual dog
customer_reviews.text: She play with the first one a little. Since she is a small dog I looked for smaller item. Then she quit-laying with them. Every once in a while I catch her playing with them. So beat me it met my expectations but they might not have met my dogs. Please no hurt feelings. I wonder if it is the squeaky noise that she doesn’t like. I thought the were cute and were small enough for her to hold. Beats me I am still trying to figure her out,
customer_reviews.author: Kay Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Our puppy loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: Our 42 pound puppy loves this chipmunk toy. He's six months old now and we've had it for over two months. He doesn't do much with the log anymore but he puts those chipmunks in his mouth and makes them squeak, it's so fun. We had to sew the seams on a couple of them a few weeks ago, but he's back playing with them again. He loves this toy and will buy it again when this one doesn't squeak anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Della Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this toy so much. He stays entertained and I am able to play with him to make it more of an interactive game. But like all dog toys should be used while under supervision my dog is an aggressive chewer and it flashed along with it for a while he could potential he rip apart the squirrels which could be dangerous if ingested. However in short periods of time my dog goes crazy over this toy honestly worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but not tough
customer_reviews.text: My dogs immediately fought over this toy. They really enjoyed playing with it and pulling the chipmunks out of the log but.... within 5 min my Golden had destroyed two of the chipmunks. Pulled the squeaker out and fluff everywhere. Now we just have them tossing around a log. Super cute toy. I'll hide other things in it I guess. Sad it didn't live up to the durability others described. Gone in 30 minutes for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fun times for puppy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second burrow toy from Zippy Paws that I purchased for my pup (the other being the coral and seahorses) and he's been having a great time with this. It's large enough that he enjoys grabbing it and shaking it back and forth, plus I can stick the chipmunks farther in so that he really has to shove his nose in to get them. He's a tough chewer and this has been holding up better than the coral and seahorses. Engaging toy and I'm thinking about trying some of the other burrow toys out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: CherohalaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My doggie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and sturdy enough! The chipmunks/squirrel/whatever are really really cute! After a few weeks of playing with this toy the little animals are still intact but you can see seems and some stuffing. Nothing falling apart yet. My pup will never let those little guys stay inside the log. She just has to pull them out whenever they're inside. It's pretty easy for my dog to pull these guys out.
customer_reviews.author: featherclips

customer_reviews.title: Torn and stuffing coming out after a week
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this toy. Our puppy is an average puppy...nothing over the top when it comes to chewing or playing hard with toys. This toy ripped in the first week and stuffing began coming out. We tried to ignore it, but it is only happening in other places now too. We have to take the toy away and put it in the trash because our return window has passed. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beloved by my squeaky obsessed dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves squeaky toys, and generally manages to rip the toys open and pull out the squeaky within an hour or so of getting a new one. Well, he plays with these chipmunks every day, and it took him 11 months to make a hole in the arm of one of them. I’ve been very impressed! He goes bonkers if I put them in the log, but he pulls them back out so fast I don’t usually bother with that part. But very sturdy toys - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Warren

customer_reviews.title: My pup fell in love with this toy immediately!
customer_reviews.text: My Rocky (38lb cattle dog mix) instantly loved this toy. He loves biting and tossing around the burrow, but especially likes chomping on the little chipmunk squeakers. He hasn't made any attempt to shred them yet because he loves the feel and the squeaks. The chipmunks are the first toys he would bring up on the couch or bed with to continue playing or cuddle with. You can also hide treats or chews on the burrow. Highly recommend this fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! Perfect for my 10 lb chihuahuas. I think one of them thinks these hedgehogs are puppies and loves to snuggle with them. The other tried to attack and shred them but has been unsuccessful so far. They’re the perfect size for their little mouths. Definitely going to have to look at buying more from the “burrow” line! Update: a month in, and just bought a refill pack of the hedgehogs. The originals are still in decent condition and the squeakers still work, but my pups have chewed off the feet and noses. I found the refill on sale and snatched it up, this is probably their favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, durable squeaker
customer_reviews.text: This little toy is surprisingly amazing. My dog is obsessed with everything from zippypaws. These little refill toys are the perfect size for her. She is a Tibetan spaniel and King Charles cavalier mix. She doesn't like rubber toys, only fabric and fabric squeaky ones, and the squeaker in these are durable! I want to collect all the shapes for her. She treats the hedgehog like teddy bears.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a few months
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved this toy. She is 6 months old and a major chewer. Unfortunately, after 2 months, she isn't very interested in the toy anymore. The log has holes where she has devoured the fabric and torn out the stuffing. She still loves the little squirrels and they still squeak. All in all, I'm happy with the product, but I would have liked it to be more sturdy for the price. Beware, the squirrels are tiny and fit great underneath the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Durable material outside good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for our new corgi. The material of the tree log itself is very durable and going to stand up to our corgi whom quickly tears through stuff but the squirrels inside have not survived past a week since Christmas. I will have to repair them and can stuff other small toys inside. If you have a smart dog that needs to be entertained intellectually this will do the trick. Great deal on price, my chihuahuas love it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and clever, but..
customer_reviews.text: My two Miniature Schnauzers were enthralled with it for an hour but now the thrill is gone. I bought the squirrel one and it is well constructed. My wife and I get a big kick out of it. It is certainly is the most attractive dog toy to see on the floor. Dogs occasionally use it for a pillow. One will grab the log and play tug of war with me when I come home. I'll stand it up with the chipmunks in their holes and one of the dogs will pull them out. But never when my wife or I am around.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. L

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know what's the deal with this toy but my puppy loves it! I can tell it's her favorite by far. She loves sticking her face into the holes and run around with the log, with or without squirrels. She also enjoys playing with the squirrels outside the log. Definitively recommend. I have only had it for a few weeks and my dog is still a puppy, so I am not sure how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: AnaBanana

customer_reviews.title: These aren't "MEDIUM", they are mini
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described. The title says "Medium" and on my phone it said the product size was 8 x 5 x 3 inches. This is misleading as this is the Dimension of the WHOLE package not the product. These are mini and my dog could choke on them. Not eligible for return so I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for puppies
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this log with squirrels. I will warn that it only lasts a day or two. She tears the squirrels open and the stuffing begins to show within hours. So typically we have to throw all 3 squirrels away within a day. She still loves the log and we only let her play under supervision. As the stuffing begins to show, we pull as much out so she can’t eat it. Anyhow it’s a great toy but realize it’s only good for a couple days if your puppy is a chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D

customer_reviews.title: Not for even mild chewers
customer_reviews.text: My 6mo Doberman is not an aggressive chewer like some labs I've had, however this was dismantled in about 3 days. The chipmunks were beheaded and de-squeaked immediately so took those away right off (choking hazard). I have two similar products from other mfg that lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dy

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard poodle. He’s not usually that excited by toys, but he does love to chase the squirrels in our yard so I figured this was a worth a shot. He LOVES this! He’s never played with a toy this much before. He’s already made some dents on the tails of 2 chipmunks, but overall holding up well. Quality is very good. Would highly recommend. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Doggo went nuts for this!!
customer_reviews.text: My doggo went BANANAZ over this cute toy!! He had a big surgery over a month ago & he lost interest in his toys & was generally meh about his little dog life. But when I opened the Amazon box he was on full alert & holy dog Christmas morning,Batman!! He went straight into his former self and dig mode! Very much worth the money for this level of entertainment!🤗☮️🙏🏻😁
customer_reviews.author: ronni marcinkowey

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: It turned out to be the greatest toy of all time. The overall quality is good! Depending on how destructive the dog is it can easily be ripped apart. My dog is not as destructive, so far he pulled the stuffing from one of the squirrels but I guess he figured out it wouldn't be as fun if he did the same for the other 2. I've had this toy for a year now, all good!
customer_reviews.author: MayhellitaC

customer_reviews.title: Dog's favorite toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 medium sized (20-25#) dogs. They love toys! I was looking for the treehouse squirrel refill and came across these so I figured we'd try it. THEY LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!! My terrier typically destroys everything with squeakers within a few weeks but seems to like this toy enough to want to keep it around longer. And my miniature poodle carries this around like it's his baby. Sleeps with it and everything. Since there are no 'extremities' there's nothing for them to chew off, unless they destroy the entire thing. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: heathers

customer_reviews.title: The seam just fell apart and the rest was just easy at that point to be torn up
customer_reviews.text: Same thing happened to mine as the review below. The seam was poorly executed and my dog (who is not a heavy chewer) tore it in the first 20mins she had it. The seam just fell apart and the rest was just easy at that point to be torn up. Super disappointing. We had the squirrel house before this and it lasted for about 6 months. This one lasted one day! It is super cute though....
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Megan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but wish the hidden animals were larger
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Just wish the hedgedogs were bigger. My dog loves this toy but unfortunately she was able to fit the whole hedgehog in her mouth and it was a little scary looking since she could get it stuck. If the hedgehogs were larger it'd be perfect. Apparently the squirrels or chipmunks are the same size. For reference my dog is around 40lbs and is a beagle mix.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my furry grandkid. He loves it. Considers the little grand kids his babies and always has one with him. He also brings the log when he wants them out back then and lives looking for them and pulling them out to play with. He had chewed a bit of the noses as he tries to show affection to them the same way as he does with his father. But the noses have been easily fixed. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else that will last
customer_reviews.text: I thought i had found the perfect toy and like the description said, my dog kept himself busy with it. 20 min in and the first squeaker gave out. I figured no big deal, it was probably a bad unit and theres still 2 more to keep him busy. 3 hours later and theyre all done. My dog isnt and aggressive chewer so this sucks. Shouldnt have happened. Now all i have is a stuffed log. Look for something thats more heavy duty even for a small or medium dog because this wont last.
customer_reviews.author: EMAN

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is small and isn't very destructive, but after a week we have already had hours of play, including tug of war and lots of biting of the chipmunks, and no rips and tears. He adores this toy and goes wild seeing the chipmunks pop and in and out of the hole. The burrowing is very fun and mentally stimulating for him. It's such a great idea for a toy I don't know why I didn't get it sooner! And terrier or dug that loves burrowing will adore this. The log is plush and easy to pop the whole thing in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for pups
customer_reviews.text: While these toys are easily torn if you allow the dog to continually chew on them, I think they are absolutely worth it. Our pup has so much fun with this line of toys. To prolong use we don’t typically leave the toys out when we aren’t around. Great way to entertain the pups when they seem bored with other toys. We have 6 of these type of toys and it never gets old.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, even for a regular chewer
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product, especially since so many reviews stated it was durable for their heavy chewers. My pup is not even close to a power chewer, and the squirrels as well as the log had stuffing coming out in less that 10 minutes out of the box. The picture I took was about 10 minutes after opening the product.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline J Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Dog didn’t really go for the looking in the log for the animals thing. She did however enjoy tearing up the animals and leaving stuffing everywhere. I had to watch her to make sure she didn’t choke on the stuffing or string. They weren’t very sturdy as she is a tiny 5 lb dog. Now I have the log left she won’t touch. All in all I give it a meh rating. Maybe my dog just isn’t that bright.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: XL Woodland Friends Burrow
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs love this dog toy. The chipmunks have squeakers in them. My 19 pound dog carries the log around and the chipmunks too. Not too big...he loves it as a pillow too. So far so good. They haven't destroyed them yet, but I keep an eye on them when they are playing a bit too rough with them. I want this toy to last, too! I would purchase these again. A very cute and (seems to be) well made dog toy. Two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: luv2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Not for Teefy Terrors!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy because of the reviews indicating it would be suitable for heavy chompers. *cue Jaws soundtrack* I suppose my doggos are a bit more 'megalondon' than 'great white' because this trio of chippymunks stood no chance to the wrath of my dogs' jaws. Unfortunately, within about eight minutes my great dane/german shepherd and beagle/hound rescues had obliterated the log and delivered capital punishment to one of the chipmunks like they were the main attraction at a public hanging in the 1800's. I rated it higher because of how adorable the toy is, and I could see it being quite an interactive and stimulating toy for pups with less sadistic and torturistic tendencies than my dynamic duo.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: "Lucy" is my newly adopted street dog. I thought there might be a learning curve to figure it out but she dove her nose right in and was so proud to get a chipmunk out! Now she's carrying the whole log around prancing and happy. Great buy. UPDATE: I've purchased her several "squeaky" toys and this is by far the most annoying sound. Just fyi.
customer_reviews.author: ~SusanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves toys that go inside of other toys and this is perfect. I have a chocolate lab and its kind of hilarious watching her cart around this big log in her mouth. She loves the chipmunks because they have squeakers in them. The toy overall feels really well made; unless your dog is in to shredding soft toys this should stand up to quite a lot of playtime. If you're buying for large dogs keep in mind that the chipmunks are fairly small. My dog does fine with them but some dogs may try to swallow them and they could pose a choking hazard. Consider your pet's toy habits and choose accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.Top Contributor: Pets

product_meta.title: ZippyPaws - Woodland Friends Burrow, Interactive Squeaky Hide and Seek Plush Dog Toy
product_meta.description: Size:Burrow| Color:Hedgehog DenZippyPaws Burrow Squeaky Hide and Seek Plush Dog Toy, Hedgehog Den
feature_bullets: FUN CHARACTERS - Dogs will have hours of fun playing with 3 adorable hedgehogs and digging them out of their den
EXCLUSIVE NOISEMAKERS - Each hedgehog includes 1 high-quality round squeaker to deliver more sound to keep your best friend entertained
INTERACTIVE PUZZLE - Challenges your dog by having them dig out the hedgehog characters, which stimulates interactive play
JUST THE RIGHT SIZE - The den burrow is great for small and medium-sized dogs, but not recommended for extra tough chewers
UNIQUE DESIGN - Beautifully-designed, high-quality pet products for the modern dog and dog owner

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
